评论概述: Easy to see which card is what
评论详情: RFID blocking wallet with card slots on the front, back and inside! Even has a spot for cash! When you push the button down the cards pop out just enough so you can see which card is which and makes it easy to find the one you want! The thickness is good because it also the magnet to keep the front closed

My old slim soft leather wallet with a similar clear ID pocket was getting grimy and it didn't do a great job protecting my cards. (My license split in my wallet while in my pocket). I picked this wallet since it was much cheaper than the Ridge wallet but had the same hard case. Everything from my previous wallet fit directly into this wallet without having to disclude anything. This wallet is about the size of a smartphone with a medium-sized case. Having a spring mechanism to pop the cards out would have been cool but I imagine the slider has fewer moving parts and will be more reliable in the long run. The mechanism has no play and is smooth. I don't love the money clip but it is firm and so far I've had no problems.
Great quality, holds about 13 cards not including the ID slot! Could not ask for a better wallet. Money clip holds 25 bills with ease

评论概述: Nice option for a compact wallet.  It is compact, easy to use, and holds a lot.
评论详情: I have been a leather bifold wallet guy for over 40 years, when my last wallet literally was leaving little pieces of leather behind every time I opened it, I decided it was time for a replacement.  So after a lot of browsing I found this wallet, and with a little trepidation ordered it.  When it arrived I was concerned that something about one third the size of my old wallet would hold everything I needed.  So I spent the next few days deciding if I was going to try it, and finally took the leap.  The wallet actually held everything from my old wallet with room for a few extra cards.  So I took it out for a test drive, it has a rather nice look, I can easily access any card in my wallet, the main card holder fans out the cards just enough to make retrieving them easy.  It is compact, light weight and easy to use much easier than my old wallet.  I recommend this to anyone who wants a compact wallet option.

The mechanism on the wallet works amazing, was using other similar type of wallets, and I constantly loosing my Apple Card, since they wasn’t holding properly, but this one, besides it has cover, holding cards pretty good. So definitely can recommend it.

评论概述: This design is better than other wallets out there!
评论详情: I love the design of this wallet. The “pocket” that you can put cards in and press the release button so they come out, is covered by the other part of the wallet (unlike some wallet designs). So if you accidentally release your cards, they don’t fall out all over the place!

I bought this as a gift for my husband because his last two wallets were this style and both of them only lasted a year. This one is nicer, had a better card slide mechanism, and holds more. Very nice.
This was great and I really like it. It’s more compact yet has enough space for multiple cards

Got a recommendation from a co worker who showed me his wallet. I bought it the same day on Amazon and have been very impressed with it. Wallet can fit 8 credit cards although 6 fit more comfortably. It has enough outside pockets to fit other none essential none RFID enabled cards. Great product for a reasonable price. I happily downsized and ditched my George Costanza wallet.  Sticking to this from now on.

Not the best wallet, the screws on the money clip have fallen out. It’s having a really hard time with the card sliding mechanism. All I have done with this wallet is use it as normal. Would not recommend
Very well designed.  Can fit so much into it.  My husband loved it!

Goes with his style and compliments his outfits. It’s very fancy and love how the cards pop up and has a cash clip.
This wallet is a joke. I gave it to my husband for Christmas and it’s already falling apart.
Easy to use, well built and room for lots of cards.

评论概述: Ladies don't give this as a gift to your man
评论详情: Don't give this as a gift unless you're sure your man will actually like it. He may pretend to like it just to keep from hurting your feelings. There is really nothing to like about this wallet.  Do you really want all your cash on display every time you pull your wallet out? The Driver's License window is not clear. It's actually frosted so you can't read the license through the window. You would need to take the license out of the wallet every time you're asked to show it. They include instructions on how to unjam the popup credit card function, so I assume this is a possibility. So what happens when you're trying to check out in the store and you can't get your credit card out? If you carry your wallet in your back pocket, like I do, I can't imagine sitting on that brick all day. I didn't keep mine long enough to put it to the test but I can imagine the money clip and the hard case would wear a hole in your pocket in a short time.  No thanks on this wallet. I'll keep my leather trifold.
Small, lightweight and perfect for cards and cash. I love mine.
This card holder is a beautiful gift for my husband, he loved it and I’m satisfied

I've owned this for a little over a month and not surprisingly a couple of weeks out of the return period, the mechanism is broken. The ID slot is too tight and the money clip only holds a couple of bills. Buyer beware!

It’s a nice wallet but it’s honestly bulkier compared to others and after only three months of using it we had to use the tool to get the credit cards out… I wouldn’t recommend this one spend the money on a ridge wallet
The sliding card ejector separated now this thing is useless. SAVE your money for something made better.

评论概述: The RFID Legit Works!!! (My Christmas Gift)
评论详情: My wife bought me this wallet for Christmas and to be honest I was skeptical of the RFID capabilities of the wallet. I assumed it was just something they said to fool people inti buying the wallet. Yet, I figured I would test it out. I have to scan into my place of work everyday and I knew it would be the perfect place to test the wallet. So the next day at work I attempted to scan into the building and wouldn't you know it... I couldn't. It actually worked. I then tried placing the card in one of the outside open slots and it worked just fine.  So if you are skeptical of the RFID dont be, it works.  The rest of the wallet is nice as well, compact and cards/cash are easy to access.  Only critique is that is a little uncomfortable to sit on due to the hard metal on the inside.  I would buy again.
Great wallet. Small and sleek and holds everything perfectly
Great quality wallet that’s sturdy and has many compartments!

Functionally, this is a great wallet and probably one of the best I've owned. My biggest concern was it's size because I carry my wallets in the front pocket. I would definitely recommend this one.

评论概述: Simple and streamlined for 2024 and beyond
评论详情: I took quite a bit of time looking through wallets before I decided on this one.  I was looking for something with plenty of card slots, two outer slots for my most used cards, and an ID card slot (clear view of ID).  It also needed to be slim enough to easily adapt to different pockets (pants, coat, etc).  This wallet checked all of the boxes.  It also came in the Camel color I was looking for, came with a 2-year warranty, and came with screws and a small tool in case I need to tighten down the metal part or replace a missing screw in the future.  I've only had the wallet for a short time now (a few days), and already people out in public are asking to see my wallet in detail when I take it out.  I can't really see any downsides at this time.  If I had to pick something to improve upon, I'd say the magnetic part of the ID fold is a little weak.  It is definitely strong enough to hold, but the ID fold will move slightly as you move the wallet around.  This wallet is still a 5/5 product, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a money clip/card holder style wallet.
